text: Donald J. Kennedy (March 2, 1930 â€“ June 29, 2023) was an American radio and television personality and voice talent, whose career began in the late 1940s with a radio announcer spot on Pennsylvania station WPIC. He is known for voicing Tansut on the adult swim program Space Ghost: Coast to Coast. He is also known for voicing Morlun on The Brak Show. Kennedy died on June 29, 2023, at the age of 93. His daughter Rebecca Maple reported that he had been suffering from dementia following a stroke in 2015. ==Voice acting== * Space Ghost: Coast to Coast - Tansut and Bill Manspeaker * The Brak Show - Morlun and Poppy * Aqua Teen Hunger Force - Assisted Living Dracula, Vegetable Man, and Rubberman (Lance Potter) ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Pennsylvania
title: Don Kennedy
